Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory81.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: 'So powerful... so impressive!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: "Those are the outsiders, aren't they? This is my first time seeing one!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After passing all the trials, you arrive at an open space with barely any decorations, and in the center is a familiar-looking crate.'}
{3: 'Surrounding it is a crowd of audiences sitting in a circle, waiting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: 'Taoist!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: 'Taoist! Fist of the Taoist!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The chatter among the mechanoids in the audience gradually grows into cheers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: "I can't believe someone's passed all the trials and arrived at this place! The way you tackle them and hunt those ghosts... Ain't never seen anything like that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Ought to have a human as the Taoist, oughtn't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'That crate...', 3: '14', 4: 'Have you been watching?', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Right, of course. Take it back! We haven't touched a single thing inside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "I've been monitoring the whole place through those recon drones above you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Foreman turns around and gestures dramatically like a Master of Ceremonies.'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'As you can see, this group called Gray Raven has passed all of our trials, and is the first to set foot in this place!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Therefore, it is my honor to announce that Gray Raven is the winner of this year's Fist of the Taoist, and their commandant, 【kuroname】, shall be crowned the Taoist Supreme!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What is a Taoist Supreme?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Just somebody really cool is what it is! Sounds terrific when we add "Supreme" to the title, ain\'t it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Is that... Kamui's logic?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But there's something that still concerns me... Mr. Foreman.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: "I'll answer what I can... and Foreman is fine.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "In that case, Foreman... We found out during our trial that this place was originally a factory, and you... Are you all mechanoids that weren't evacuated?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Probably. I remember the chief foreman, who, y'know, was the foreman in charge, telling all the humans to evacuate immediately, so those folks all followed him and left.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "And... you all stayed behind because the evacuation order didn't include you...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "That's right, and we've been wandering in this place ever since.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I thought you only gather here on specific dates... but you've been staying here since then, haven't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There must be Corrupted around, however few there are... Were you ever in danger?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Foreman', 3: 'Of course we did! And we learned a painful lesson for sure.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Will you consider relocating after this? Babylonia has set up several bases on the surface...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "No, I don't think so. I think we will stay.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Even when it's dangerous?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "Because this place is filled with our memories of the ol' days. We've been commemorating the chief foreman and the humans even when it isn't the Ghost Festival.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'One more thing. The "Generals" and the other mechanoids aren\'t how mechanoids in a factory should look like. What exactly...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's happening to the recon drones... What's that noise?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Foreman', 3: "It's time.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's time?"}
{3: 'As Lucia speaks, a ray of blinding light shines from above, showering all of you like rain, completely swallowing you in its radiance.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's with the light?"}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's the drones! Liv, protect Commandant!"}
{3: 'Lucia and Lee believe the light to be a sign of danger, and they immediately draw their weapons while Liv watches the surroundings.'}
{3: 'And you cannot help but close your eyes.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory81.jpg'}
{3: 'As the light fades, all that is left next to you is the supply crate. Every one of the mechanoids has vanished into thin air.'}
{3: 'In your shock, you slowly recall the voice you heard when you were showered in light.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Ain't it been a while since we've found a human who'd play with us? Thank you, 【kuroname】."}
